history.content: You could ask around any decals if they are willing to give you two units as long as you make up the work you have missed by doing some alternative stuff. I think there was a piazza post last year that had the same problem, but I remember as long as you talk to your advisor (or if you just have a late change of schedule request left), contacting a decal shouldn't be a problem if you just mass email them :)

Hello, I'm a transfer student planning to graduate this fall. Pretty recently, I found out that I need 2 more units to graduate from L&S. This came as a surprise since I've been meeting with advisors every semester to make sure that I was on track to graduate, and I was always told that I was good to go with my planned schedule. Luckily, I've been mentoring for CSM this semester. I could have added this as a course for 2 units at the start of the semester, but I did not do so because I didn't realize that I needed the units. So basically, I've been doing all the work required to get the 2 units, but I'm just not enrolled. I'm in the process of getting the necessary signatures for the late change of schedule form to add CSM as a course. Can anyone verify that this will work? I just want to make sure I can graduate on time, especially since I have a job lined up after I graduate. Thank you!
history.subject: Late adding 2 units to graduate
